verses.verse: Moreover, from the blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material,] they made <S%H6213><s%> finely <S%H8278><s%> woven <S%H8278><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for ministering <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, as well as the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were for Aaron, <S%H175><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> [and] of blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material,] and fine <S%H8336><s%> twisted <S%H7806><s%> linen. <S%H8336><s%>

Then they hammered <S%H7554><s%> out gold <S%H2091><s%> sheets <S%H9449><s%> and cut <S%H7112><s%> [them] into threads <S%H6616><s%> to be woven <S%H6213><s%> in [with] the blue <S%H8504><s%> and the purple <S%H713><s%> and the scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material,] and the fine <S%H8336><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of a skillful <S%H2803><s%> workman. <S%H2803><s%>
They made <S%H6213><s%> attaching <S%H2266><s%> shoulder <S%H3802><s%> pieces for the ephod; it was attached <S%H2266><s%> at its two <S%H8147><s%> [upper] ends. <S%H7117><s%>

And the skillfully <S%H2805><s%> woven <S%H2805><s%> band <S%H2805><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was on it was like its workmanship, <S%H4639><s%> of the same <S%H4480><s%> material: of gold <S%H2091><s%> [and] of blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material,] and fine <S%H8336><s%> twisted <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And they made <S%H6213><s%> the onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> set <S%H5437><s%> in gold <S%H2091><s%> filigree <S%H4865><s%> [settings;] they were engraved <S%H9466><s%> [like] the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet, <S%H2368><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he placed <S%H7760><s%> them on the shoulder <S%H3802><s%> pieces of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> [as] memorial <S%H2146><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the breastpiece, <S%H2833><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of a skillful <S%H2803><s%> workman, <S%H2803><s%> like the workmanship <S%H4639><s%> of the ephod: <S%H646><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> [and] of blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material] and fine <S%H8336><s%> twisted <S%H7806><s%> linen. <S%H8336><s%>

It was square; <S%H7251><s%> they made <S%H6213><s%> the breastpiece <S%H2833><s%> folded <S%H3717><s%> double, <S%H3717><s%> a span <S%H2239><s%> long <S%H753><s%> and a span <S%H2239><s%> wide <S%H7341><s%> when folded <S%H3717><s%> double. <S%H3717><s%>

And they mounted <S%H4390><s%> four <S%H702><s%> rows <S%H2905><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%> on it. The first <S%H259><s%> row <S%H2905><s%> [was] a row <S%H2905><s%> of ruby, <S%H124><s%> topaz, <S%H6357><s%> and emerald; <S%H1304><s%>
and the second <S%H8145><s%> row, <S%H2905><s%> a turquoise, <S%H5306><s%> a sapphire <S%H5601><s%> and a diamond; <S%H3095><s%>
and the third <S%H7992><s%> row, <S%H2905><s%> a jacinth, <S%H3958><s%> an agate, <S%H7618><s%> and an amethyst; <S%H306><s%>

and the fourth <S%H7243><s%> row, <S%H2905><s%> a beryl, <S%H8658><s%> an onyx, <S%H7718><s%> and a jasper. <S%H3471><s%> They were set <S%H5437><s%> in gold <S%H2091><s%> filigree <S%H4865><s%> [settings] when they were mounted. <S%H4396><s%>

And the stones <S%H68><s%> were corresponding <S%H5921><s%> to the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> they were twelve, <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> corresponding <S%H5921><s%> to their names, <S%H8034><s%> [engraved with] the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet, <S%H2368><s%> each <S%H376><s%> with its name <S%H8034><s%> for the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> tribes. <S%H7626><s%>

And they made <S%H6213><s%> on the breastpiece <S%H2833><s%> chains <S%H8333><s%> like cords, <S%H5688><s%> of twisted <S%H1383><s%> cordage <S%H5688><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> in pure <S%H2889><s%> gold. <S%H2091><s%>

And they made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> filigree <S%H4865><s%> [settings] and two <S%H8147><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> rings, <S%H2885><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> on the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastpiece. <S%H2833><s%>
Then they put <S%H5414><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> cords <S%H5688><s%> in the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> at the ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastpiece. <S%H2833><s%>

And they put <S%H5414><s%> the [other] two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> cords <S%H5688><s%> on the two <S%H8147><s%> filigree <S%H4865><s%> [settings,] and put <S%H5414><s%> them on the shoulder <S%H3802><s%> pieces of the ephod <S%H646><s%> at the front <S%H6440><s%> of it.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> and placed <S%H7760><s%> [them] on the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastpiece, <S%H2833><s%> on its inner <S%H1004><s%> edge <S%H8193><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was next <S%H413><s%> <S%H5676><s%> to the ephod. <S%H646><s%>

Furthermore, they made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> and placed <S%H5414><s%> them on the bottom <S%H4295><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> shoulder <S%H3802><s%> pieces of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> on the front <S%H6440><s%> of it, close <S%H5980><s%> to the place <S%H4225><s%> where <S%H4225><s%> it joined, <S%H4225><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> the woven <S%H2805><s%> band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod. <S%H646><s%>

And they bound <S%H7405><s%> the breastpiece <S%H2833><s%> by its rings <S%H2885><s%> to the rings <S%H2885><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> with a blue <S%H8504><s%> cord, <S%H6616><s%> that it might be on the woven <S%H2805><s%> band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and that the breastpiece <S%H2833><s%> might not come <S%H2118><s%> loose <S%H2118><s%> from the ephod, <S%H646><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
Then he made <S%H6213><s%> the robe <S%H4598><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> of woven <S%H707><s%> work, <S%H4639><s%> all <S%H3632><s%> of blue; <S%H8504><s%>

and the opening <S%H6310><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> was [at the top] in the center, <S%H8432><s%> as the opening <S%H6310><s%> of a coat <S%H8473><s%> of mail, <S%H8473><s%> with a binding <S%H8193><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> its opening, <S%H6310><s%> that it might not be torn. <S%H7167><s%>

And they made <S%H6213><s%> pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material and] twisted <S%H7806><s%> [linen] on the hem <S%H7757><s%> of the robe. <S%H4598><s%>

They also made <S%H6213><s%> bells <S%H6472><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the bells <S%H6472><s%> between <S%H8432><s%> the pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on the hem <S%H7757><s%> of the robe, <S%H7757><s%>

alternating a bell <S%H6472><s%> and a pomegranate <S%H7416><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on the hem <S%H7757><s%> of the robe, <S%H7757><s%> for the service, <S%H8334><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
And they made <S%H6213><s%> the tunics <S%H3801><s%> of finely <S%H8336><s%> woven <S%H707><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%>

and the turban <S%H4701><s%> of fine <S%H8336><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> and the decorated <S%H6287><s%> caps <S%H4021><s%> of fine <S%H8336><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> and the linen <S%H906><s%> breeches <S%H4370><s%> of fine <S%H8336><s%> twisted <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%>

and the sash <S%H73><s%> of fine <S%H8336><s%> twisted <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> and blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material,] the work <S%H4639><s%> of the weaver, <S%H7551><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And they made <S%H6213><s%> the plate <S%H6731><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and inscribed <S%H3789><s%> it like the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet, <S%H2368><s%> "Holy <S%H6944><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

And they fastened <S%H5414><s%> a blue <S%H8504><s%> cord <S%H6616><s%> to it, to fasten <S%H5414><s%> it on the turban <S%H4701><s%> above, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Thus all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> was completed; <S%H3615><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses; <S%H4872><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> they did. <S%H6213><s%>

And they brought <S%H935><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its furnishings: <S%H3627><s%> its clasps, <S%H7165><s%> its boards, <S%H7175><s%> its bars, <S%H1280><s%> and its pillars <S%H5982><s%> and its sockets; <S%H134><s%>

and the covering <S%H4372><s%> of rams' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed <S%H119><s%> red, <S%H119><s%> and the covering <S%H4372><s%> of porpoise <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and the screening <S%H4539><s%> veil; <S%H6532><s%>
the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> and its poles <S%H905><s%> and the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat; <S%H3727><s%>
the table, <S%H7979><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> its utensils, <S%H3627><s%> and the bread <S%H3899><s%> of the Presence; <S%H6440><s%>

the pure <S%H2889><s%> [gold] lampstand, <S%H4501><s%> with its arrangement <S%H4634><s%> of lamps <S%H5216><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its utensils, <S%H3627><s%> and the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light; <S%H3974><s%>

and the gold <S%H2091><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> and the fragrant <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%> and the veil <S%H4539><s%> for the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent; <S%H168><s%>

the bronze <S%H5178><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> and its bronze <S%H5178><s%> grating, <S%H4346><s%> its poles <S%H905><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its utensils, <S%H3627><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> and its stand; <S%H3653><s%>

the hangings <S%H7050><s%> for the court, <S%H2691><s%> its pillars <S%H5982><s%> and its sockets, <S%H134><s%> and the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> its cords <S%H4340><s%> and its pegs <S%H3489><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the equipment <S%H3627><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> for the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting; <S%H4150><s%>

the woven <S%H8278><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for ministering <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place and the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> to minister <S%H3547><s%> as priests. <S%H3547><s%>

So the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> examined <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> they had done <S%H6213><s%> it; just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded, <S%H6680><s%> this <S%H3651><s%> they had done. <S%H6213><s%> So Moses <S%H4872><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them.
